alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 7:39PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...A line of strong showers and isolated thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Los Angeles County through 815 PM PDT... At 737 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong showers and isolated thunderstorms along a line extending from near West Covina to La Habra. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down trees, tree limbs, and power lines, and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pomona...West Covina...Whittier...San Dimas...La Verne... Diamond Bar...Hacienda Heights...Baldwin Park...Covina...Claremont... La Habra Heights...La Puente...and Walnut. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley
